participant_1.background:
I make time for myself to work out and eat healthy, even if it's just a 30-minute walk every day.
i do not have much energy.
my weekends are spent studying and looking over client files.
i want a porsche.
I was snorkeling last week and a sea turtle swam right up next to me

participant_2.background:
I like to spend time with my pets because it makes me feel young.
I value my relationship with my partner and make sure they know I am there for them.
I eat a slice of my favorite pizza to cheer up.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.
i work in a bank.

content.text: Hello there!
Hello! How are you today?
Pretty good.  Just got back from a snorkel trip.
That sounds exciting! Did you see anything cool?
I saw a sea turtle! It was so cool.
Wow! That's amazing! I love animals.
Yeah, I was pretty excited.  I'm not usually one for outdoor activities, but this was really neat.
I'm not usually one for outdoor activities either, but I always enjoy myself when I do.
Yeah, it's nice to get out and experience something different.  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my pets, read, and write.
I love to read! What are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book about the history of the world.
That sounds interesting! I'm not sure I would have the patience for that.
It's actually not as boring as it sounds.  It's really interesting to learn about how the world has changed over time.
I guess I could see that.  What do you like about writing?
I like being able to express myself and share my thoughts with others.
That's a great reason to write.  I wish I was more creative.
You're creative in your own way.  You just have to find what you're passionate about and express that through your writing.
That's a good point.  I'll have to think about that.
You should!  It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the advice!  I think I will.
You're welcome!  I'm always happy to help.
